article_title: Israel vows 'heavy price' for Houthi missile strike
sentence: "Israeli  forces  launched  a  campaign  to  destroy  Hamas  following  the  7  October  attacks,  which  saw  around  1,200  people  killed  and  another  251  taken  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Israel vows 'heavy price' for Houthi missile strike
sentence: More  than  41,206  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  the  campaign  began,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Israel vows 'heavy price' for Houthi missile strike
sentence: In  July,  one  man  was  killed  and  eight  people  were  injured  after  a  Houthi  drone  landed  in  Tel  Aviv.
